title: The Last First Kiss
description: After Kate McKenna's dream job slips through her fingers and the man she loves breaks her heart, she comes back to Loudon. Not knowing where else to turn, Kate returns to her childhood home and begins to work for her mother at What's Perkin'. With a bandage on both her ego and her heart, Kate's life starts down a new path, that is, until Donovan Price rolls into town. Will Kate's heart be shattered again, or will she find the courage to embrace her future?
author: Lucinda Race
